ai-ya2.3.2:1.1_0: * The one who lost the entire mass of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
ai-ya2.3.2:2.1_0: Or one who stops the aggregates of feeling is the full extent of form.
ai-ya2.3.2:3.1_0: There is no aggregate for form, there is no feeling born in them.
ai-ya2.3.2:4.1_0: Or one who, when feeling does not finish the entire mass of form, does not completely understand that.
